channel.title: Help with [pi] how do u remove 40def 2 cast mage?
channel.description: And how would you remove from having 2 have 40defence to use vengeance?

item.title: Help with [pi] how do u remove 40def 2 cast mage?
item.dc:creator: @ImNoHacker ImNoHacker
item.description:
@ImNoHacker wrote:

pking4fam:

ok got it thnx but now where would the 40defence be? like cause with vengeance u shouldn’t need 40defence 2 cast it?

Look around. Tr using/casting the spell. What message does it give you? Remember the message. Go search for it.

It will most likely have an

if(playerSkill[#] != 50{
sM(“you must have 50 def to do this bro”);
or
sendMessage
or c.sendMessage
buncha diff sM’s lol

just means that if your def isnt level 50 then u cant do it… Just take it out… easy

40 def… whtev

Read full topic
